welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sault Ste. Marie, where the natural beauty of the Great Lakes meets the charm of a historic Canadian city. Enjoy the stunning waterfront, rich history, and lively culture as you explore our wonderful city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chippewa County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chippewa County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kincheloe AFB Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Kincheloe AFB Airport is used for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sault Ste. Marie Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Sault Ste. Marie Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sault Sainte Marie Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sault Sainte Marie Airport handles freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
